summary: Project Dashboard redesign testing completed successfully. All core features verified working: workspace.projects RPC returns project list with live status, frontend ProjectDashboard shows cards in grid layout with all required info (name, type badge, entry point, last modified, file count, status dot). Run/Stop/Preview/Logs/Setup buttons work correctly. No more tab-based navigation - replaced by drill-down ProjectDetail view.
passed_tests: Backend: workspace.projects returns list of projects with name, type, status, port, process info, last_modified, file_count
Backend: workspace.projects cross-references with _processes dict for live status
Backend: Projects show correct project_type (python/node detection)
Backend: todo-app detected with has_venv=true, has_deps=true
Backend: demo-app detected with has_venv=false
Backend: workspace.run_project, workspace.stop_process, workspace.detect_project methods exist
Frontend: Project Dashboard shows project cards in grid layout
Frontend: Each card shows project name, type badge (Python), entry point (app.py), last modified time, file count
Frontend: Card shows gray status dot when stopped, green pulsing dot when running
Frontend: Card shows 'Run' button when stopped
Frontend: Card shows 'Stop' button when running
Frontend: Card shows 'Preview' link with port (:5000) when running
Frontend: Clicking 'Files' drills into ProjectDetail view with file browser
Frontend: ProjectDetail has back arrow to return to dashboard
Frontend: ProjectDetail header shows project name, type badge, status, Run/Stop/Preview/Logs buttons
Frontend: Clicking Run shows RunProjectForm with name, command, port fields
Frontend: Terminal view shows live process logs with 'LIVE' indicator
Frontend: Stop button successfully stops running process
Frontend: '1 running' badge appears in header when project is running
Frontend: No more tab-based navigation (Files/Processes/Custom Tools tabs are gone)
seed_data_creation: Used existing test projects: demo-app (Python, no venv) and todo-app (Python with venv/requirements.txt)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Project Dashboard redesign fully implemented. workspace.projects endpoint scans /app/workspace/projects/ and cross-references with _processes dict for live status. Frontend polls every 5 seconds. ProjectCard and ProjectDetail components handle all project interactions. Custom tools section appears at bottom only when tools exist. Key data-testid attributes: project-dashboard, project-card-{name}, project-run-{name}, project-stop-{name}, project-browse-{name}, project-preview-{name}, project-detail, project-back-btn, run-project-form, run-project-name, run-project-port, run-project-command, terminal-view.

custom_tools_section.behavior: Collapsible, only shown when tools exist
